name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, a Taiwanese netizen posted a video on Douyin saying, "Friends from the mainland, do you have any questions?" Netizens in the comment area offered their blessings one after another, "I really envy you, I wish you happiness" "I have cooperated with many Taiwanese clients, they are really super good clients" "My Taiwanese colleagues have left a good impression on me, I hope my Taiwanese compatriots are happy and healthy"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12 (Released) Lankao County, Henan. The man said that he worked at Xinhong Insulation Material Factory in 2018. On November 3, an explosion occurred during production at the factory, killing 8 people and disfiguring himself.
Afterwards, the county party committee promised to bear all expenses, but after the secretary was transferred, the government refused to treat him, and he was imprisoned by the police for three years.
After being released from prison, he asked the government to bear the medical expenses, but was still evaded by the leaders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to netizens who are familiar with the matter, the incident was caused by the female passenger mistakenly purchasing a train card for the 26-30 age group, rather than the 16-25 age group that was suitable for her. In fact, the former ticket is more expensive, and although according to regulations, she does need to pay for the ticket, the conductor usually does not ask for it. Some people believe that the conductor was deliberately making things difficult for her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, at the border of Huanggang and Wuhan, workers were dismantling the nucleic acid sampling point.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, someone graffitied in large letters at the entrance of Tianjin 1958 Hotel: "Down with the corrupt officials"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Full video: During a live broadcast, the female anchor of Jiyue Automobile was suddenly informed by colleagues that the company had gone bankrupt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, the comment section under the official Douyin recruitment video was overturned.
The recruitment video said: Joining the army to practice martial arts and serving the country with loyalty is the common dream of every aspiring young man. For yourself, for your country, don't be afraid of hardships, live up to your youth, devote yourself to the times, and devote yourself to your passion.
Netizens in the comment section complained: Who is it for? Who is for me? Let your son realize his dream. I can't go out on my electric bike. Was the preferential card given to the female Land Rover driver?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12, Jilin Liaoyuan: A gas explosion occurred in a store, and a group of dance school students were trapped in the second-floor window and asked for help.
Official report: The fire has been extinguished, 13 people were hospitalized, including 2 seriously injured

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Nanning held a city promotion and promotion conference in Harbin, and its policy of "buy a house and get a free job" caused controversy.
The promotional PPT said that Nanning has reached an agreement with BYD and Nanning Rail Transit, and Northeastern friends can be arranged with suitable jobs when they buy a house.
Not only can they guarantee that you can take on the mortgage, but they also considerately arrange work in BYD's sweatshop to ensure that you can live a full-scale, all-weather life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
More videos of the drone crash site
The dashcam in video 1 recorded the moment the plane crashed, and video 2 showed a raging fire at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
More videos of the Liaoyuan gas explosion
Video 1 records the moment of the explosion, with the shock wave and fireball reaching across the street.
Video 2 shows the huge fire at the time
In video 3, the children who were previously trapped upstairs in the dance school climbed down the ladder to escape

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, a female student bullying incident occurred at Xiamen University's Tan Kah Kee College. A senior student was beaten and injured. The victim needed to have steel nails implanted and was in a wheelchair, and was at risk of paralysis. However, the school kept covering her mouth and kept deleting the posts sent by the victim at two or three in the morning. The victim was also summoned by the school for a talk. Alumni kept making up stories on the student forum. Students questioned the school one after another, and some even started to form groups and threatened to march.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the Internet, the attacker said arrogantly: "I have already investigated and there is no surveillance. I will beat you to death today."
The contributor said: The police insisted on classifying the case as mutual fighting because there was no surveillance. The girl who beat the victim insisted that she was mentally ill, had a background, and her relatives ran a restaurant outside the school, trying to evade legal sanctions.
In the second picture, some students felt that a march was needed now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplement: Video of a girl being bullied at Xiamen University Tan Kah Kee College
The video clearly records the entire process of the victim being beaten, with constant screams at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, the day of the "Nanjing Massacre" Memorial Day in China, after discussion, 12 Japanese schools in China decided to suspend classes in seven schools, and 5 Japanese schools in Beijing, Shanghai and other cities switched to online teaching.
The official website of the Chinese Embassy in China published an announcement on the Japanese version of the website on December 6, reminding Japanese citizens to pay special attention to the relevant memorial days and calling on them to avoid speaking in Japanese in public places "at a volume that can be heard by those around them".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, the police issued a notice saying that three women died after failed rescue efforts and the driver was suspected of drunk driving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, Qingdao Licang District Forest Park real estate project, a large number of workers rushed into the real estate sales office to demand their wages.
The workers all brought their quilts and sat on the floor in the sales office to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Recently, the "Lianbi Finance" fraud case has finally been concluded. The company went bankrupt in 2018 and it took seven years to finally return 2.5% of the investment to the victims.
An investment of 1 million yuan, and a refund of 20,000 yuan was completed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, suppliers at Nezha Auto headquarters put signs on their bodies to demand debts
A Weibo blogger revealed that some suppliers have come to the door of Nezha headquarters to defend their rights. Photos show that two people were wearing signs that read: "Small and micro enterprises are facing financial difficulties. We hope that Mr. Fang Yunzhou, Chairman of Nezha Auto, will immediately arrange for payment of the project funds that have been completed and accepted."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, Jiemian News reported that Xu Jiayin and Evergrande were again restricted from high consumption. However, according to Tencent, Xu Jiayin has disappeared and been detained for more than a year. He was recently transferred to the Shenzhen Special Detention Center to cooperate with the liquidation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many citizens in Zhengzhou, Henan reported that thieves were looking for pedestrians on the street and then waiting for an opportunity to steal mobile phones. According to pictures taken by netizens, the thieves wore a baseball cap and a mask and rode an electric bike, wandering on the street looking for victims.
A woman said that she put her mobile phone in her pocket, and a man walked around behind her and stole her mobile phone.
The thieves have been active in Zhengzhou for half a month, but the police have not yet caught them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12, Qinhuangdao, Hebei. A man and his friends were having dinner at a restaurant. During the meal, he found that the liquor provided by the restaurant was fake, so he argued with the boss.
At first, the boss did not admit it, and then the boss locked the man and his group in the store. The boss's wife said bluntly, "I sell fake liquor, come and arrest me."
After the police arrived, the boss picked up a knife from the kitchen and chased the man in front of the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, Li Tie, the former head coach of the Chinese men's football team, was sentenced to 20 years in prison for the crimes of accepting bribes, offering bribes, offering bribes by a unit, and offering bribes to non-state employees.
Former CCTV host Liu Jianhong once praised Li Tie as an "upright person" in a live broadcast.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Yongzhou, Hunan. A mobile vendor died of poisoning while burning charcoal to keep warm in a tricycle. The vegetables next to the tricycle were neatly arranged.
A nearby merchant said: The old man came very early to get a good position. It was still dark, so he burned charcoal in the tricycle to keep warm. Because the tricycle cab was closed, the accident happened.
Netizens replied "Alas, I hope I won't have to suffer so much in my next life" "Those who suffer in winter are the poor"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 12, Guangdong. A woman was riding her bike late at night and saw a young man trying to jump off a bridge. The young man was holding a piece of glass in his hand and there was blood on his arm. The woman hurriedly dissuaded him and called the police.
The young man said he was born in the 2000s and started working at the age of 12. He sent all the money he earned to his family, but no matter how hard he tried, his colleagues and family always felt that he was not good enough. The young man said, "I am so tired."
After the police arrived, they took the man away. The young man thanked the woman for her guidance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 13, the U.S. Embassy and Consulate in China responded to the "World Human Rights Day statement was censored by China and deleted from Chinese platforms": Despite this, we will not stop exposing the shocking human rights practices of China and the authorities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, crash barrier stones have been installed on many roads and schools in Zhuhai City.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a new term "sexual depression" has appeared on social media platforms, which refers to the fact that sex life is becoming less popular among young Chinese people.
A questionnaire survey initiated by Peking University and Fudan University showed that the sexual activity of the younger generation is declining, and only about half of those born after 1995 have sex at least 1-2 times a week, which is lower than those born after 1980 and early 1990.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4, Shaanxi. Traffic police fined truck drivers for driving while fatigued. The traffic police said that the Beidou monitoring system showed that they were driving while fatigued. According to regulations, drivers need to rest for 20 minutes every four hours.
But the driver said that they were driving the truck with two people.
Netizens responded, "So fatigue driving refers to the vehicle, not the person" "I'm really touched. You can't let the vehicle get too fatigued"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the Moscow Times, Russia's foreign exchange is close to exhaustion. Before the outbreak of the Russian-Ukrainian war, the Russian National Wealth Fund NWF had about $140 billion in liquid assets, but now this figure has shrunk significantly to $53.8 billion. 
In order to cope with the massive fiscal deficit, the Russian Central Bank sold 50 tons of gold from June to December, and now only 279 tons of gold remain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 13 (Release) Wu Hao, a lecturer at the School of Social Sciences of Central China Normal University, said: In the villages I surveyed, the elderly only received a monthly pension of 80-160 yuan, which is only 3.5% of the urban employee pension on average. Therefore, families can only coordinate resources internally, and the elderly become the ones who are sacrificed, or sacrificed voluntarily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, the Central Economic Work Conference was held in Beijing. The meeting decided to appropriately increase the basic pension for retirees and the basic pension for urban and rural residents, which aroused doubts from netizens.
Netizens responded, "The 10,000 yuan pension for civil servants will increase again," "The public servants are happy," "The public servants have another reason to give themselves money."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 13, workers put up signs demanding their wages at China Resources Land Plaza in Shunde District, Foshan City, Guangdong Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, "Brother Liang", who had previously been interviewed by a lawyer for claiming that Huawei's new product sales were poor, once again posted a video saying that his account was currently blocked and his suppliers would stop supplying to him, resulting in a loss of income. Influence
 Brother Liang said that no matter how much you criticize foreign mobile phones, it’s okay, but you can’t criticize domestic mobile phones. “Such strict control over speech without freedom of speech is not a good thing.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 13, it was reported that former Hong Kong Legislative Council member Lam Cheuk-yin and six victims of the 721 Yuen Long white-clad violence were found to have participated in a "riot". Lam Cheuk-yin and six other people were accused of provoking the white-clad people when they gathered at the MTR Yuen Long Station on July 21, 2019, which led to the attack by the white-clad people. Before arriving at the scene, Lam Cheuk-yin posted on social media to call on more people to join and confront the white-clad people. Therefore, they were charged with suspected rioting, but all denied the charges.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 13, Yuzhou, Henan. A woman posted a video saying that her sister was studying at Yuzhou No. 1 Senior High School. Her sister suddenly fell to the ground during the high school physical test. The teacher did not know cardiopulmonary resuscitation and had to wait for the school doctor to come and deal with it. 
"But later I found out that the school doctor was practicing medicine illegally and did not know cardiopulmonary resuscitation at all" and "it took seven or eight minutes to arrive" after the accident, causing her sister to miss the best time for rescue. 
Afterwards, the school destroyed the surveillance evidence, and the family members held banners in front of the school to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 13 (Released) Chengdu, Sichuan. The "bent Christmas tree" next to the Mixc Mall has sparked heated discussions, with netizens joking that "in Chengdu, even the Christmas trees are bent."
This "bent Christmas tree" comes from the Christmas tree in the classic American animation Grinch.
At present, this Christmas tree has been removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, Cailianshe reported: Japan's housing prices exceed 10 times annual income, and Tokyo's is 18 times.
Netizens responded, "Is 10 times still worth mentioning? Look at our Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen." "Here we seem to be more than 50 times."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Liu Qiang, who once threw a Molotov cocktail at the Japanese Embassy, was recently detained for 13 days by the Guangzhou Panyu District police for defending his rights because the property management company was unwilling to repair the damage to the community corridor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 13, Wuhan, Hubei. Netizens posted a video saying that a retired party member in Baofu Community occupied basic fertile land to build a luxurious villa. The video shows that the villa also has a private back garden.
Netizens in the comment area replied: "The only thing missing is the armed police standing guard" "The basement will surprise you"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 13 (released), Linfen, Shanxi. Homeowners of Jiuzhou Huayunfu Community put up banners to protect their rights.
November 13 (released), Hefei, Anhui. Employees of Jiyue 4S store protect their rights and demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 10, Puyang, Henan. Yang Wencang, 32 years old this year, has necrosis in his left lung and a hole in his right lung. Even though he is already terminally ill, he still has to take care of his 80-year-old mother who is paralyzed in bed.
Yang Wencang said that his mother is paralyzed in bed and his uncle is mentally disabled. The 500 yuan minimum living allowance is the only income for the family. The doctor recommended surgery, but the high cost made him discouraged.
The blogger gave Yang Wencang some money, and his mother cried out of guilt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Fujian posted that her 14-year-old sister committed suicide on December 5. In her suicide note, she wrote: "You hope that I will be successful in the future, but I am useless and cannot do that. My future is confused and no one can light the way forward for me. You only have expectations for your children, but no substantial help. I am so tired of living." The woman also said that her monthly salary is 5,500 yuan. After deducting various expenses such as rent, she will send 3,000 yuan to her family every month. It was not until now that she realized that the money was taken by her family to gamble, and not a penny was spent on her sister.
